title: Upgraded interior, Onsite playground, Onsite bike storage
posting_body: Maris at Martinez is your everyday escape, ideally nestled in the hills of the East Bay.
Our 1 & 2 bedroom apartments feature gorgeous spaces designed for high-end style and comfort.
Modern finishes are sleek and chic throughout the home, while energy-efficient appliances and an in-home washer and dryer effortlessly keep chores under control.

In-home washer and dryer                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity-Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas-Stainless steel appliances including refrigerator, electric range, and dishwasher                                                                                                                                Select units                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Featured amenity-Upgraded interior-Private balcony or patio-Large closets with extra storage-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat

Resident social lounge-Terrace featuring barbecue pavilion and firepit                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)-State-of-the-art fitness center                                                                                         Featured amenity-Immediate access to State Route 4-Controlled-entry access with dedicated and covered parking                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Onsite playground-5.45 acres of lush landscaped grounds-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:
